about.bio: I'm Edison Uwihanganye, a Computer Scientist and Fullstack Developer with expertise in modern web technologies, AI integration, and blockchain development. With over 5 years of experience building robust applications and mentoring developers, I combine technical excellence with a passion for teaching and innovation.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
experience.description: Lead developer for enterprise web applications with Next.js, React, and TypeScript. Implemented AI-powered features and improved performance metrics by 40%.

experience.title: Blockchain Developer
experience.description: Developed smart contracts and DApps for financial inclusion projects. Created a blockchain education platform reaching over 1000 developers.

experience.title: Fullstack Developer
experience.description: Built RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express. Developed frontend interfaces with React and implemented CI/CD pipelines.

projects.title: AI-Powered Learning Platform
projects.description: An adaptive learning platform that uses AI to personalize educational content based on student progress and learning patterns.
highlights: Implemented adaptive learning algorithms that improved student completion rates by 35%
Built a real-time feedback system using WebSockets
Developed custom visualizations for learning analytics

projects.title: Decentralized Marketplace
projects.description: A blockchain-based marketplace allowing artisans in Rwanda to sell directly to global customers without intermediaries.
highlights: Smart contracts for secure escrow and transparent transactions
Decentralized storage of product images and details using IPFS
Connected over 200 local artisans with international customers

projects.title: Developer Portfolio Template
projects.description: An open-source, customizable portfolio template for developers built with Next.js and TailwindCSS.
highlights: Optimized for performance with 98+ Lighthouse scores
Fully responsive with dark mode support

projects.title: Health Monitoring System
projects.description: An IoT-based health monitoring system that collects patient data and provides real-time analytics for healthcare providers.
highlights: Machine learning models for predicting health anomalies
Secure encryption for sensitive patient data

mentorship.description: As a passionate educator and mentor, I've guided over 500 developers through their coding journey, helping them build projects, master new technologies, and launch their careers in tech.

testimonials.name: Diane Mukasine
testimonials.comment: Edison's mentorship transformed my career. His clear explanations and practical projects helped me land my first developer job within 3 months.

testimonials.name: Jean Paul Habimana
testimonials.comment: Learning blockchain development seemed impossible until I joined Edison's program. His step-by-step approach made complex concepts accessible.

testimonials.name: Grace Uwamahoro
testimonials.comment: Edison doesn't just teach code, he teaches problem-solving. The skills I gained from his mentorship have been invaluable throughout my tech career.
